show_name: Dragon Ball: Goku's Fire Fighting Regiment (special)
other_title: ドラゴンボール 悟空の消防隊 (Japanese)
plot: Goku is a member of a town-firebrigade and after helping a young girl and her brother with an accidental fire, he teaches them about fire-safety. Goku's brigade is later summoned to rescue Bulma when a fire starts in her apartment.
ending_theme: "Makafushigi Adventure!" by Nozawa Masako and Tanaka Mayumi
